Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fizzikgames.string.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Offers string utility functions for manipulating or encrypting strings
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

      • trimSubstring

        public static java.lang.String[] trimSubstring(java.lang.String s,
                               java.lang.String pivot,
                               boolean optimized)
        Returns a String array with index 0 is the String before the parameter String, and index 1 is the rest of the String after the parameter String. So if a String was "All work and no play", and the parameter String was " ", then this function would return String[0] = "All", and String[1] = "work and no play".
        Parameters:
        s - string to take substring from
        pivot - the string to trim from the two sides of the string
        Returns:
        substring

      • firstOccurenceBeforePos

        public static int firstOccurenceBeforePos(java.lang.String src,
                          java.lang.String c,
                          int pos)
        Finds and returns the position of the first occurence of the one character string before the given position inclusively.
        Parameters:
        src - the source string
        c - the character to search for
        pos - the position to backtrack from
        Returns:
        int

      • md5

        public static java.lang.String md5(java.lang.String src)
        Returns the md5 hash of a source string's bytes using UTF-8 character set
        Parameters:
        src - the source string
        Returns:
        the md5 has of the source string
